pages.text: Those disbelieved say Ona je posol! Say GOD suffices mat rad svedok mi ona those possess znalost scripture
A L. R. scripture my revealed ona v poradie lead ludia darkness lahky -v accordance s will ich Lord -Do chodnicek Almighty the Zasluzny
Chodnicek GOD Jeden possesses everything heavens everything zem. Woe do disbelievers; they incurred hrozny retribution
They je the jeden dat priority this zivot over Hereafter zapudit way GOD seek robit it crooked they ist daleko astray
My nie send any posol preach jazyk jeho ludia v poradie clarify things them! GOD POTOM sends astray whomever He wills guides whomever He wills. He bol Almighty the Vela Wise
Thus my sent Moses our zazrak saying Lead tvoj ludia darkness lahky remind them z dni GOD These bol lekcia kazdy steadfast appreciative clovek
